pullRequest.title: list-saved enhancements
pullRequest.bodyText: For each saved file it now lists the URLs as well as the name (using the same format as list).

commit.message: Modify list-saved to print name and URLs for each file
Change list-saved test to reflect new functionality
add test to verify URLs are printed correctly

nodes.bodyText: There's an extra whitespace after the when on this line. Have you done a mvn spotless:apply to auto-format the code?
